document_data.name: Haeler Thommadur
document_data.mainbody: '''Haeler Thommadur''' was a warrior during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Haeler organized a caravan under the orders of [[Ascaleld Marurryn]], who acted as negotiator for the [[Sembia]]n [[Rolling Wheel]]. In truth, Haeler wanted to use the caravan as bait for some bandits operating in the area. With the help of some adventurers, Haeler and his men managed to clear the area.
